code_snippets: page.theme = ft.Theme(    page_transitions=ft.PageTransitionsTheme(        android=ft.PageTransitionTheme.OPEN_UPWARDS,        ios=ft.PageTransitionTheme.CUPERTINO,        macos=ft.PageTransitionTheme.FADE_UPWARDS,        linux=ft.PageTransitionTheme.ZOOM,        windows=ft.PageTransitionTheme.NONE    ))
